thread.title: Guggenheim Money Manager James Michal Resigns After Internal Investigation

author: Justin Baer
title: Guggenheim Money Manager James Michal Resigns After Internal Investigation

organizations.name: resigns after internal investigation guggenheim partners lp

text:
Guggenheim Partners LP said James Michal, a star money manager with the investment firm, resigned following a company investigation into his behavior.
“The issue regarding his deportment was not related to his duties as a portfolio manager,” Anne Walsh, Guggenheim’s chief investment officer for fixed income, wrote in a note to employees Monday. “The matter was fully investigated and, upon the completion of the investigation, Mr. Michal resigned, with immediate effect.”
...
